Class Patient

java.lang.Object
clinic.Person
clinic.Patient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Person>
public class Patient extends Person
Represents a Patient, which is a type of Person with an associated visit history.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient()
      Constructs a Patient with a null profile and visits.

    • Patient

      public Patient(Appointment appointment)
      Constructs a Patient using the given appointment. The patient's profile is set from the appointment's patient, and the visit is initialized.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment associated with the new patient

    • Patient

      public Patient(Profile profile)
      Constructs a Patient with the given profile.
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile of the patient

  • Method Details

    • getVisitHeadNode

      public Visit getVisitHeadNode()
      Gets the head node of the visit linked list for this patient.
      Returns:
      the head visit node

    • charge

      public int charge()
      Calculates the total charge for all visits associated with this patient.
      Returns:
      the total charge as an integer

    • addVisitNode

      public void addVisitNode(Appointment appt)
      Adds a visit node for a given appointment to this patient's visits.
      Parameters:
      appt - the appointment to be added as a visit

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the patient, including the profile and total amount due.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Person
      Returns:
      a string representation of the patient
